source_sentence: 「是故，善現！
translation: "Therefore, good performance!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著色，不應取著受、想、行、識；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著眼處，不應取著耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著色處，不應取著聲、香、味、觸、法處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著眼界，不應取著色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著耳界，不應取著聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著鼻界，不應取著香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著舌界，不應取著味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著身界，不應取著觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著意界，不應取著法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著地界，不應取著水、火、風、空、識界；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著無明，不應取著行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著布施波羅蜜多，不應取著淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著內空，不應取著外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著真如，不應取著法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著苦聖諦，不應取著集、滅、道聖諦；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著四靜慮，不應取著四無量、四無色定；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著八解脫，不應取著八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著四念住，不應取著四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著空解脫門，不應取著無相、無願解脫門；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著菩薩十地；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著五眼，不應取著六神通；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著佛十力，不應取著四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著無忘失法，不應取著恒住捨性；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切智，不應取著道相智、一切相智；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切陀羅尼門，不應取著一切三摩地門；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著預流果，不應取著一來、不還、阿羅漢果；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著獨覺菩提；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切菩薩摩訶薩行；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著諸佛無上正等菩提；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切如來、應、正等覺所有佛性、如來性、自然法性、一切智智性。」
translation: 菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著色，不應取著受、想、行、識；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著眼處，不應取著耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著色處，不應取著聲、香、味、觸、法處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著眼界，不應取著色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著耳界，不應取著聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著鼻界，不應取著香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著舌界，不應取著味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著身界，不應取著觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著意界，不應取著法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著地界，不應取著水、火、風、空、識界；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著無明，不應取著行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著布施波羅蜜多，不應取著淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著內空，不應取著外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著真如，不應取著法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著苦聖諦，不應取著集、滅、道聖諦；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著四靜慮，不應取著四無量、四無色定；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著八解脫，不應取著八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著四念住，不應取著四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著空解脫門，不應取著無相、無願解脫門；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著菩薩十地；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著五眼，不應取著六神通；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著佛十力，不應取著四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著無忘失法，不應取著恒住捨性；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切智，不應取著道相智、一切相智；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切陀羅尼門，不應取著一切三摩地門；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著預流果，不應取著一來、不還、阿羅漢果；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著獨覺菩提；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切菩薩摩訶薩行；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著諸佛無上正等菩提；菩薩摩訶薩亦不應取著一切如來、應、正等覺所有佛性、如來性、自然法性、一切智智性。」

source_sentence: 爾時，欲、色界諸天子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the celestials of the desire and form realms said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多最為甚深，難見難覺，不可尋思超尋思境，寂靜微妙審諦沈密，聰叡智者乃能了知。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is most profound, difficult to see and difficult to perceive, inconceivable, transcending the object of discursive thought, and tranquil, subtle, deeply felt, and profoundly understood by a wise and intelligent person.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若諸有情能深信解如是般若波羅蜜多，當知已曾供養過去無量諸佛，於諸佛所發弘誓願多種善根，已為無量諸善知識之所攝受，乃能信解甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translation: "If sentient beings can deeply believe and comprehend the perfection of wisdom like this, they should know that they've made offerings to measureless buddhas in the past, made vast vows with many good roots to those buddhas, and have been taken in by measureless good teachers, and then they're able to believe and comprehend the profound perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 假使三千大千世界諸有情類，一切皆成隨信行、隨法行、第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺，彼所成就若智若斷，不如有人一日於此甚深般若波羅蜜多忍樂思惟，稱量觀察。
translation: Suppose there were sentient beings in a world of 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, all of whom had become practicing followers of faith, practicing followers of the Dharma, eighth, ascetic, once-returner, nonreturner, arhat, and solitary realizer, and they had accomplished neither knowledge nor cessation, wouldn't it be like a person who for one day patiently contemplates, evaluates, and observes this profound prajñāparamitā with joy.

source_sentence: 是人於此甚深般若波羅蜜多所成就忍，勝彼智斷無量無邊。
translation: That person's tolerance achieved by this profound prajñāpāramitā is measureless and limitless compared to their knowledge and cessation.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 諸隨信行所有智斷，皆是已得無生法忍菩薩摩訶薩忍少分故。
translation: All knowledge that follows faithful practice is eliminated because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva has attained a modicum of forbearance in the cognition of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 諸隨法行、第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺所有智斷，皆是已得無生法忍菩薩摩訶薩忍少分故。」
translation: All the knowledge that follows the practice of the Dharma, the eighth, pre-flow, first-returner, nonreturner, arhat, and solitary realizer are all eliminated because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva has attained a small measure of the forbearance of the nonarising of the Dharma."

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告諸天子言：「如是！
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the celestials, saying, "So it is!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如汝所說。
translation: As you've said.

source_sentence: 諸隨信行、若隨法行、第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺所有智斷，皆是已得無生法忍菩薩摩訶薩忍之少分。
translation: The practice of following faith, the practice of following principles, the eighth, prerogative, first-returner, nonreturner, arhat, and solitary realizer, and all their cognitions are all partial to the forbearance of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who has attained the forbearance of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「天子當知！
translation: "You should know, my lord!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等，暫聽如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，聞已書寫、讀誦、受持、思惟、修習，是善男子、善女人等，速出生死證得涅槃，勝餘欣求聲聞、獨覺諸善男子、善女人等，遠離般若波羅蜜多學餘經典，若經一劫若一劫餘。
translation: "If good men and good women listen to such a profound prajñāpāramitā for a moment and then write, recite, memorize, contemplate, and practice it after hearing it, these good men and good women will quickly escape birth-and-death and realize nirvāṇa, which is superior to other good men and good women who aspire to be direct disciples or solitary realizers and who study other sūtras apart from prajñāpāramitā, whether after one or more eons.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 諸天子！
translation: all the sons of gods!

source_sentence: 於此般若波羅蜜多甚深經中，廣說一切微妙勝法，諸隨信行、若隨法行、第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺、菩薩摩訶薩，皆應於此精勤修學，一切如來、應、正等覺皆依此學，已證、當證、現證無上正等菩提。」
translation: This is the profound scripture of the perfection of wisdom that explains in detail all the subtle and excellent things that faith-attaching practitioners, Dharma-attaching practitioners, the eighth, prerunners, first-comers, nonreturners, arhats, solitary realizers, and bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, should diligently train in, and by which all tathāgatas, worthies, and right ascendants train and realize, will realize, and will now realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment."

source_sentence: 時，諸天子俱發聲言：「世尊！
translation: The celestials then all spoke up and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是大波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is the great perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是不可思議波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is the unfathomable perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是不可稱量波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is an incalculable perfection.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是無數量波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is incalculable.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多是無等等波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is the perfection of peerlessness.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 諸隨信行、若隨法行、第八、預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢、獨覺，皆於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多精勤修學，速出生死證得涅槃。
translation: All those who practice according to faith, practice according to the Dharma, the eighth, prerunner, first-comer, nonreturner, arhat, and solitary realizer diligently cultivate such profound prajñāpāramitā, and quickly escape birth-and-death and realize nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 一切菩薩摩訶薩，皆於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多精勤修學，速證無上正等菩提。
translation: All bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and arhats diligently cultivate such profound prajñāpāramitā and quickly realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 雖諸聲聞、獨覺、菩薩皆依如是甚深般若波羅蜜多精勤修學，各得究竟，而是般若波羅蜜多不增不減。」
translation: Although śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, and bodhisattvas all rely on such profound prajñāpāramitā and diligently train in it, each attains the ultimate, but prajñpāramitā neither increases nor decreases."

source_sentence: 時，欲、色界諸天子眾說是語已，頂禮佛足右遶三匝辭佛還宮，去會不遠忽然不現。
translation: After they said those words, the gods and goddesses of the desire and form realms bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet, circled him three times to his right, and returned to the palace.

source_sentence: ◎初分眾喻品第四十四之一◎爾時，具壽善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At the time, Kauśāmbī Sunbeam said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，深生信解，復能書寫、讀誦、受持、思惟、修習，是菩薩摩訶薩從何處沒來生此間？」
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva hears and teaches such a profound prajñāpāramitā and deeply believes it, and then is able to write, recite, memorize, contemplate, and cultivate it, where has this bodhisattva-mahāsattva gone from here to be born here?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「善現！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，不怯不弱、不忌不憚、不疑不惑、歡喜愛樂，繫念思惟甚深般若波羅蜜多所有義趣，若行、若立、若坐、若臥曾無暫捨，常隨法師恭敬請問，如新生犢不離其母。
translation: If a bodhisattva Mahāsattva hears and teaches such a profound prajñāpāramitā and deeply believes in it, he isn't intimidated or weak, isn't jealous or confused, isn't doubtful or joyous, and is joyous and happy, he fixes his thoughts on all the profound prajñāpāramitā's meanings and objectives, and never forgets them for a moment if he walks, stands, sits, or lies down, always following the Dharma teacher and respectfully asking questions, just like a newborn calf that doesn't part from its mother.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩為求般若波羅蜜多甚深義趣，終不遠離般若法師，乃至未得甚深般若波羅蜜多經典在手，受持、讀誦、思惟、修習、究竟通利，常隨法師未曾暫捨。
translation: Such a bodhisattva never parts with a Prajñāpāramitā teacher in order to pursue the profound import of the Prajñāpāramitā, even when he has yet to acquire the profound Prajñāpāramitā sūtras in his hand, retains, recites, contemplates, cultivates, and thoroughly penetrates them, and always follows the teacher without ever letting go of them for a moment.

source_sentence: 「善現當知！
translation: "You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩從人趣沒來生人中。
translation: "This is a bodhisattva who goes from a human rebirth to a human rebirth.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 此菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等，先世樂聽甚深般若波羅蜜多，聞已受持、讀誦、思惟、精勤修習，復能書寫眾寶莊飾，又以種種上妙花鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translation: These good men and good women of the bodhisattva vehicle were delighted to hear the profound prajñāpāramitā in a prior life, and after hearing it, they accepted, recited, contemplated, and diligently cultivated it. They were also able to write and decorate it with many treasures, and they offered respect, honor, and praise it with a variety of fine flower garlands, scattering incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, banners, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 由此善根從人趣沒還生人中，聞是般若波羅蜜多深生信解，復能書寫、讀誦、受持、思惟、修習。」
translation: From these good roots, they are led back to life from their human destiny, and when they hear this prajñāpāramitā, they deeply believe in it and are able to write, recite, memorize, contemplate, and cultivate it."

source_sentence: 具壽善現復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Guoshou Shanjin then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 頗有菩薩摩訶薩成就如是殊勝功德，供養承事他方諸佛，從彼處沒來生此間，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，復能書寫、讀誦、受持、思惟、修習無懈倦不？」

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩先從他方無量佛所，聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，復能書寫、讀誦、受持、思惟、修習，無有懈倦，彼乘如是善根力故，從彼處沒來生此間。
translation: That bodhisattva Mahāsattva first heard about such profound prajñāpāramitā from measureless buddhas in other places and deeply believed in it, then was able to write, recite, memorize, retain, contemplate, and cultivate it without laziness, and it was because of the strength of his good roots that he was reborn here from that place.

translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle personal belonger who hasn't asked about the profound meaning of the Dharma without forgetting it after hearing about it in a previous life and is now born among humans who hear about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, but whose mind is confused, hesitant, faint, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞恒住捨性，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Although there are bodhisattvas in the vehicle Pudgala who heard about the nature of eternally abiding equanimity in a prior life but didn't ask about its profound meaning and are now born among humans who hear about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, their minds are confused, hesitant, faint, or give rise to different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞一切智，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle person who hasn't asked about the profound meaning of omniscience after having heard about it in a previous life and is now born among humans and hears about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, but his mind is confused, hesitant, timid, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞道相智，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle personal belonger who hasn't asked about the profound meaning of the wisdom of the path after having heard about it in a prior life and is now born among humans who hear about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, but whose mind is confused, hesitant, timid, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞一切相智，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle person who hasn't asked about the profound meaning of omniscience even though he heard about it in a previous life and is now born among humans who hear about such profound prajñāpāramitā, whose mind is confused, hesitant, timid, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞一切陀羅尼門，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose a bodhisattva vehicle named Pudgala, who in a prior life heard about all the dhāraṇī teachings but didn't ask about their profound meaning, is now born among humans and hears about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, and his mind is confused, hesitant, faint, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞一切三摩地門，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle Pudgala who, having heard about all the approaches to samādhi in a prior life but didn't ask about their profound meaning, is now born among humans and hears about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, but his mind is confused, hesitant, faint, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞一切菩薩摩訶薩行，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose there's a bodhisattva vehicle Pudgala who, although he heard about all the bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices in a prior life and didn't ask about their profound import, is now born among humans and hears about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, but his mind is confused, hesitant, faint, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞諸佛無上正等菩提，而不請問甚深義趣，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，其心迷悶、猶豫、怯弱或生異解。
translation: "Suppose a bodhisattva vehicle named Pudgala, who in a prior life heard about the buddhas' unsurpassed correct enlightenment but didn't ask about its profound meaning, is now born among humans and hears about such a profound prajñāpāramitā, and his mind is confused, hesitant, faint, or has different understandings.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good present!

source_sentence: 有菩薩乘補特伽羅，雖於先世得聞般若波羅蜜多，亦曾請問甚深義趣，而不能經一日、二日、三、四、五日隨順修行，今生人中聞說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，設經一日乃至五日，其心堅固無能壞者，若離所聞，尋便退失。
translation: "Although there are bodhisattvas in the vehicle Pudgala who heard of the perfection of wisdom in a prior life and have asked about its profound meaning but couldn't follow its practice for one, two, three, four, or five days, and are now born among humans who hear and teach such a profound perfection of wisdom, even if their minds are resolute and incapable of decay after a day or even five days, they'll lose their search if they part with what they've heard.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩乘補特伽羅，由於先世得聞般若波羅蜜多，雖復請問甚深義趣，而不如說隨順修行故，於今生若遇善友慇懃勸勵，便樂聽受甚深般若波羅蜜多，若無善友慇懃勸勵，便於此經不樂聽受。
translation: "Suppose a bodhisattva vehicle named Pudgala, having heard the prajñāpāramitā in a prior life and having asked about its profound meaning and not cultivating it as instructed, happily listens to and receives the profound prajñāpāramitā if he meets a good friend who encourages him, or he doesn't happily listen to this sūtra if he doesn't have a good friend who encourages him.

source_sentence: 彼於般若波羅蜜多，或時樂聞、或時不樂，或時堅固、或時退失，其心輕動進退非恒，如堵羅綿隨風飄颺。
translation: Sometimes they're pleased to hear the perfection of wisdom, sometimes they're not, sometimes they're resolute, sometimes they regress, and their mind wavers, advancing and regressing without constancy, like a lint wrapped in the wind.

source_sentence: 「善現當知！
translation: "You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 如是補特伽羅發趣大乘經時未久，未多親近真善知識，未曾供養諸佛世尊，未曾受持、讀誦、書寫、思惟、演說甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translation: Thus, when he first set out for the great vehicle sūtras, Pudgala hadn't been close to many genuine good teachers, hadn't made offerings to the buddhas and world-honored ones, and hadn't yet memorized, recited, written, considered, or explained the profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 「善現當知！
translation: "You should know, good present!

source_sentence: 如是補特伽羅未曾修學甚深般若波羅蜜多，未曾修學靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；未曾修學內空，未曾修學外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；未曾修學真如，未曾修學法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；未曾修學苦聖諦，未曾修學集、滅、道聖諦；未曾修學四靜慮，未曾修學四無量、四無色定；未曾修學八解脫，未曾修學八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；未曾修學四念住，未曾修學四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；未曾修學空解脫門，未曾修學無相、無願解脫門；未曾修學菩薩十地；未曾修學五眼，未曾修學六神通；未曾修學佛十力，未曾修學四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；未曾修學無忘失法，未曾修學恒住捨性；未曾修學一切智，未曾修學道相智、一切相智；未曾修學一切陀羅尼門，未曾修學一切三摩地門；未曾修學預流果法，未曾修學一來、不還、阿羅漢果法；未曾修學獨覺菩提法；未曾修學一切菩薩摩訶薩行；未曾修學諸佛無上正等菩提。
translation: 如是補特伽羅未曾修學甚深般若波羅蜜多，未曾修學靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；未曾修學內空，未曾修學外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；未曾修學真如，未曾修學法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；未曾修學苦聖諦，未曾修學集、滅、道聖諦；未曾修學四靜慮，未曾修學四無量、四無色定；未曾修學八解脫，未曾修學八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；未曾修學四念住，未曾修學四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；未曾修學空解脫門，未曾修學無相、無願解脫門；未曾修學菩薩十地；未曾修學五眼，未曾修學六神通；未曾修學佛十力，未曾修學四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；未曾修學無忘失法，未曾修學恒住捨性；未曾修學一切智，未曾修學道相智、一切相智；未曾修學一切陀羅尼門，未曾修學一切三摩地門；未曾修學預流果法，未曾修學一來、不還、阿羅漢果法；未曾修學獨覺菩提法；未曾修學一切菩薩摩訶薩行；未曾修學諸佛無上正等菩提。

source_sentence: 「善現當知！
translation: "Good present, you should know!

source_sentence: 如是補特伽羅新趣大乘，於大乘法成就少分信敬愛樂，未能書寫、受持、讀誦、思惟、修習、為他演說甚深般若波羅蜜多。」
translation: Thus, a person newly destined for the great vehicle who has cultivated a modicum of faith, respect, and joy in the great vehicle teaching is unable to write, memorize, recite, contemplate, practice, or expound for others the profound prajñāpāramitā."

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百一十一
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra, Volume 311
